---json
{
  "permalink": "feed.xml",
  "eleventyExcludeFromCollections": true,
  "metadata": {
    "title": "Effusion Labs",
    "description": "Recent updates from Effusion Labs",
    "language": "en",
    "base": "https://effusionlabs.com/"
  }
}
---
{% set posts = collections.recentAll | slice(0, 20) %}
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<!-- build: {{ build.hash }} -->
<rss version="2.0" xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom">
  <channel>
    <title>{{ metadata.title }}</title>
    <link>{{ metadata.base }}</link>
    <atom:link href="{{ permalink | htmlBaseUrl(metadata.base) }}" rel="self" type="application/rss+xml" />
    <description>{{ metadata.description }}</description>
    <language>{{ metadata.language }}</language>
    <lastBuildDate>{{ build.date | dateToRfc822 }}</lastBuildDate>
    {%- for post in posts %}
    {%- set absUrl = post.url | htmlBaseUrl(metadata.base) %}
    <item>
      <title>{{ post.data.title }}</title>
      <link>{{ absUrl }}</link>
      <description>{{ post.content | renderTransforms(post.data.page, metadata.base) }}</description>
      <pubDate>{{ post.date | dateToRfc822 }}</pubDate>
      <guid>{{ absUrl }}</guid>
    </item>
    {%- endfor %}
  </channel>
</rss>
